pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correcting False Discovery Rates // There are many estimators of false discovery rate. In this package we compute the Nonlocal False Discovery Rate (NFDR) and the estimators of local false discovery rate: Corrected False discovery Rate (CFDR), Re- ranked False Discovery rate (RFDR) and the blended estimator. Bickel, D.R., Rahal, A. (2019) https://tinyurl.com/kkdc9rk8.
